long_description: Comfortable and casual, slender and streamlined, the OluKai Nohea Nubuck shoes are a modern classic featuring premium nubuck leather uppers with handsewn moccasin stitching. Premium, soft nubuck leather uppers with dual gores feature Dri-Lex(R) synthetic microfiber suede linings; shoes can be worn with or without socks. High-density EVA midsoles offers stability and support for your heel and midfoot, while softer EVA footbeds provide premium step-in comfort. Nonmarking molded gum rubber outsoles feature a Kava-root-inspired tread pattern; outsoles hold up to the rigors of everyday wear.
short_description: Comfortable and casual, slender and streamlined, the OluKai Nohea Nubuck shoes are a modern classic featuring premium nubuck leather uppers with handsewn moccasin stitching.
